description.long: Enhances the defense of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Defense.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

Enhances the defense of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Defense.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

description.short: Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: Reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

description.short: Enhances Defense, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: Enhances the defense of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Defense.Scale}%, reduces endurance costs by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

Enhances the defense of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Defense.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Gives the user a 20% chance for protection from teleportation effects and +5% resistance to all damage types. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
